solution_line_template: Dave bought {num_white_packs} packs of white shirts * {white_pack_size} = <<{num_white_packs}*{white_pack_size}={num_white_shirts}>>{num_white_shirts} white shirts.
Dave bought {num_blue_packs} packs of blue shirts * {blue_pack_size} = <<{num_blue_packs}*{blue_pack_size}={num_blue_shirts}>>{num_blue_shirts} blue shirts.
Dave bought a total of {num_white_shirts} + {num_blue_shirts} shirts = <<{num_white_shirts}+{num_blue_shirts}={total_shirts}>>{total_shirts} shirts.
